title: Bab Sebta (2008) PAL DVD5 VIDEO_TS [DVDR]
description:
[IMG]http://i265.photobucket.com/albums/ii205/joaor100/cartaz.jpg[/IMG]

BAB SEBTA means in arabic the door of Ceuta and it is the narrow passage in the frontier between Marocco and Ceuta. It is the last obstacle that face those who came from all over Africa to arrive to Europe.
The film BAB SEBTA visits four cities, looking for the rituals of the awaiting and the voices of those travellers.

Uploader Comments:
Filmed by a 5 person crew, Bab Sebta passes by Tanger, Oujda (Morocco), Noadhibou and Nouakchott (Mauritania) searching for the stories of the nomad heroes of our days. A journey with camarades and adventurers.
